hero.headline: I turn ambiguous problems into simple, lovable products.
hero.sub: PM with a business-analytics foundation. Healthcare & L&D work; discovery → PRD → shipped.

about.intro: Hello! I’m Ankita Pathak. I build clean, intuitive experiences and back every decision with data.
about.details: Business Analytics (IIM Indore) powered my pivot from B.Tech to product & analytics. I work end-to-end: discovery, crisp PRDs, close partnership with engineering, and instrumentation to measure what shipped actually moved.
strengths: Discovery & interviews — personas, workflows, requirement clarity.
Documentation — BRDs/PRDs, user stories with acceptance criteria, release notes.
Data-to-decision — DOMO, Tableau, Power BI, GA & Looker Studio for actionable insights.
Delivery — backlog hygiene, sprint planning, cross-functional coordination (CSM).

work.title: Clinical Trial Platform — Data Capture & Exec Dashboards
work.desc: Defined north-star KPIs and PRDs after 20+ stakeholder conversations, then instrumented DOMO for leadership views (trial status, budget vs. expense). Outcome: ~80% automation of insight generation and faster reporting cycles.

work.title: Gamified L&D Application
work.desc: Designed engagement model and analytics plan; set up DAU/MAU and custom events (games created, dwell time). Tightened backlog hygiene → clearer prioritization and ~20% improvement in delivery pace.

academic.title: Insurance Fraud Analysis — IIM Indore
academic.desc: Built a rule-based approach on patient insurance data to flag anomalous zones using usage patterns and histories of known bad actors.

academic.title: Machine Learning in Bioinformatics (Cancer Genomics) — JIIT Noida
academic.desc: Applied ML methods to genomics signals to distinguish cancerous vs. non-cancerous expression profiles; documented limitations and feature gaps for future work.

academic.title: Understanding COVID-19 in India — IIT Roorkee
academic.desc: Explored public datasets to correlate age, gender, and socio-economic factors with infection trends; summarized findings in a research-style report.

experience.title: Senior Associate — Analytics
bullets: Owned discovery for a clinical trial platform (20+ stakeholder interviews); translated findings into PRDs and user stories in Jira/Confluence.
Partnered with engineering in daily scrums; tracked risks/dependencies to keep delivery unblocked.
Established shared data definitions and reporting cadence; co-authored enablement docs for go-live.

experience.title: Product Business Analyst
bullets: Shipped a gamified learning app end-to-end: problem framing, market scan, backlog, and PRDs; collaborated with design on wireframes.
Ran UAT and coordinated launch; set up GA + Looker Studio to monitor engagement and adoption.
Drove prioritization rituals and improved story standards to reduce ambiguity across the team.

experience.title: Consulting Virtual Experience
bullets: Completed a consulting simulation: competitor analysis, feature prioritization, and measurement plan.
Analyzed social media campaign data and proposed optimizations.

education.line: Integrated Program in Business Analytics — IIM Indore (2020)
